price: and all praise is due to Him in the heavens and earth – and [glorify Him] in the afternoon and at noon[7].
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَعَشِيّٗا وَحِينَ تُظۡهِرُونَ
footnotes: [7] The "afternoon" refers to ‘Asr prayer, and "noon" refers to Zhuhr prayer.
